#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int ar[100000];
int countbit(int n)
{  int count=0;
   while(n)
   {  count=count+(n&1);
      n>>=1;
   }
   return count;
}
int main()
{  int i,t,num,sum;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {  cin>>num;
      sum=0;
      for(i=1;i<=num;i++)
      {  sum=sum + countbit(i); }
      cout<<sum<<endl;
   }
   //system("pause");
   return 0;
}
